Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer<T>  
    WindowInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundPanel
    This class chooses the background image for the game, it is used only in the lobby window
    BoardPanel
    this class chooses the board image
    CardSelectionTest  
    CardSelectionWindow
    This class represents the window, where the first player can choose the cards that will be used during the game
    DummyView  
    GameWindow
    This class represents the main window of the game, where the actual game takes place
    GodSelectionWindow
    this class represents the window where, in turn, the second (and third) player can choose his god card
    LobbyWindow
    This class represents the initial window of the game, the lobby window, where the players decide their usernames and the number of players they want to play with
    Observable<T>  
    View
    the view class handles the client-side of the application recived a messageToVirtualView establish what the player is supposed to see handling the gui windows
    ViewBox
    this class represents a box
    VirtualView
    the virtual view class is used in the server-side of the application it receives the choice from the client and sends them to the controller and takes the messageToVirtualView from the model and sends to the clients in this project the virtual view is only the receiver and sender of messages the checks and elaboration methods are implemented in the controller (server-side) or the view (client-side)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ViewState
    this enumerations contains all the possible states that the view can be in during the game there is a correspondence between the viewStates and the State Classes in the Model
